## Key Challenges

### How could generative AI be used...

- ... to ensure the most important [**legislation**](challenges/legislation.qmd) is passed and delivered?
- ... to make the most complex parts of [**government policy making**](challenges/policy.qmd) more efficient?
- ... to equip government with the [**best people and tools**](challenges/equipped.qmd) to be effective?
- ... to help government [**communicate**](challenges/communicate.qmd) with the public, and help the public communicate with government?
